articles.title: More than 3000 people are working on Call of Duty, Activision says - TweakTown
articles.description: Call of Duty is by far Activision-Blizzard's most important franchise, and now 31% of its workforce is working on the franchise.
articles.content:
Activision-Blizzard confirms nearly 1/3rd of its total employee headcount is working on the Call of Duty franchise.
